# Trauma Station Rules
- This server expects roleplay from it's players.
- General rules to go by are listed below.
- You can get clarification and examples by clicking the rule.
- You must be [bold]18+ years[/bold] old to play, for playerbase maturity.
## CORE RULES - These always apply.
- [textlink="0. Losing is part of the game" link="RuleC0"] - [textlink="1. Don't be a dick" link="RuleC1"] - [textlink="2. Do not use information gained outside of in-character means" link="RuleC2"] - [textlink="3. Roleplay is expected" link="RuleC3"] - [textlink="4. Players in vital job roles require a minimum amount of effort" link="RuleC4"] - [textlink="5. In-game administration rulings are final" link="RuleC5"] - [textlink="6. Only use English" link="RuleC6"] - [textlink="7. Erotic/creepy stuff is not allowed." link="RuleC7"] - [textlink="8. Players need to be the age of 18 or above" link="RuleC8"] - [textlink="9. Bigotry is not allowed" link="RuleC9"] - [textlink="10. New Life Rule" link="RuleC10"]
## IN GAME RULES - These apply to non-antagonists.
These are the roleplay rules for our servers, they apply to all [bold]non-antagonists[/bold].
- [textlink="1. Roleplay is required" link="RuleR1"] - [textlink="2. Escalation is expected" link="RuleR2"] - [textlink="3. Do not validhunt" link="RuleR3"] - [textlink="4. Do not powergame" link="RuleR4"] - [textlink="5. Play a Believable Character" link="RuleR5"]
## ROLE SPECIFIC RULES - These apply only to the said role. You only have to follow rules that apply to your job.
This includes if you get promoted to said job.
- [textlink="1. Cyborg / AI" link="RuleS1"] - [textlink="2. Assistants" link="RuleS2"] - [textlink="3. Security" link="RuleS3"] - [textlink="4. Command" link="RuleS4"] - [textlink="5. Insurgents" link="RuleS5"] - [textlink="6. Antagonists" link="RuleS6"]
By accepting these rules, you consent to the server redialing you to other servers in our network.
